title: Payed full price for a discounted skin
body:
Hello there Riot, 

I just bought Master Arcanist Ziggs for 1350RP. Half an hour after my purchase Ziggs was discounted to 50% off the full price to 675RP. 
I was wondering if I would be able to get some RP back (being charged for the discounted price) seeing that it wasn't too long after Ziggs went on discount sale.

Thank you, 


RebirthKnight

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sorry to hear this happened, however support no longer offers refunds in cases such as these as the [sales are announced in advance](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/may-sales-schedule).

Your only option in this situation is to use a refund token (if you have any left) and then re-purchase the skin at the lower price.

Hi SephirothSG,

Unfortunately on the OCE page the rotation was posted more than 18hrs before  the skins are released on the client at a random time. Unfortunately I missed out by 30 mins because of the random timing that the deal was released. I unfortunately do not have any refund tokens, and it is a shame you can't get 1 refund token at the beginning of each season or something of the sort.

Thank you for the reply. It just sucks that I just spent 1350RP (which we all know is not cheap) to a skin that is now 675RP because of random releases during the day and not at the beginning of the week. 

Kindest Regards, 


RK
The sales schedule was posted 22 days ago, not 18 hours ago.
